column1: Sirumugai is a Panchayat town in Coimbatore district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu
column2: which is well known for Silk Sarees Bazaars.

column1: Sirumugai is located at 11.33°N 77.02°E﻿ / 11.33; 77.02. It has an average elevation of 292 metres (958 feet). It is situated in the northern part of Coimbatore district
column2: on the banks of the Bhavani River.
